a:r.a:t: Manufactures industrial and consumer packaging products
Flexibles segment generated $405 million in 2015, 8% of total revenue
Includes pouches, easy open / re-close bags and stick packs
New pet product offerings include OptiPack (easy open / re-close for pet treats) and Clear Retort Pouch and Lidding (see through window with unique presentation)
Jack Sanders, CEO, noted a proactive approach towards synergistic acquisition opportunities, with a focus in the $200 million range
Manufactures thermoformed packaging for fresh fruit and vegetables found in retail supermarkets
Acquisition enables Sonoco to capture new growth in the rapidly expanding fresh and natural category
Develops and manufactures flexible and rigid packaging materials for consumer packaged goods companies, retailers, and other industrial manufacturers
Acquisition will significantly expand Sonoco’s flexible packaging and thermoforming plastics operations

p:cNvPr.descr: Image result for personal care industry

a:r.a:t: Opportunity to leverage Sonoco’s global footprint and increase Gateway’s penetration in international markets
Expand pet care packaging solutions offering
Pursued aggressively and submitted offers in Lincoln flexible packaging deals
Acquired Graffo Paranaense de Embalagens S.A.
Acquisition provided Sonoco with the resources to strengthen customer relationships and technical capabilities in the growing Brazilian market
Acquisition expanded ThermoSafe’s global presence and offering of insulated parcel and pallet solutions
